var $$$nativeWindowKeysCheckMap = {},
i = 0,
l = $$$nativeWindowKeys.length;

$$$nativeWindowKeysCheckMap[$$$nativeWindowKeys[i]] = 1;
}
window.__globalErrorEvents = [];
function errorEventHandler(e) {
window.__globalErrorEvents.push(e);
}
function addEvent(el, ev, fn) {
if (el) {
if (el.addEventListener) {
el.addEventListener(ev, fn);
} else if (el.attachEvent) {
el.attachEvent(ev, fn);
}
}
}
addEvent(window, 'error', errorEventHandler);
delete window.addEvent;
</script>

!important;font-style:normal !important;min-height:auto !important;font-size:13px !important;margin:0 !important;padding:0 !important;}.syntaxhighlighter{width:100%;position:relative !important;border:1px solid #ccc !important;border-radius:4px !important;border-collapse:separate !important;background-color:#f5f5f5 !important;margin:.3em 0;}.syntaxhighlighter.source{overflow:hidden !important;}.syntaxhighlighter .italic{font-style:italic !important;}.syntaxhighlighter caption{text-align:left !important;color:#000 !important;padding:.5em 0 .5em 1em !important;}.syntaxhighlighter ol{list-style:decimal;margin:0px 0px 1px 0px;padding:2px 0;color:#AFAFAF;font-size:1.0em;line-height:1.4em;color:#afafaf !important;background-color:#f7f7f9;}.syntaxhighlighter ol li{list-style:decimal;border-left:1px solid #E1E1E8;padding-left:10px;line-height:1.1em;margin:0 0 0 45px;}.syntaxhighlighter.show{display:block !important;}.syntaxhighlighter.collapsed .toolbar{font-size:1em !important;position:static !important;width:auto !important;color:blue <body id="auto-id-1525607567324" class="auto-1525607567318-parent auto-1525607567278-parent auto-1525607567279-parent">
<div id="j-activityBanner" class="f-dn ga-click" data-cate="小黄条" data-action="点击" style="position:relative;z-index:300;"></div>
<div id="j-activityRightBanner" class="ga-click" style="position:fixed;z-index:300;text-align:right;right: 16px;bottom:143px;"><div class="u-signIn-container  e-hover-source"><div class="u-signIn-txt  e-hover-source "><a class="u-signIn-txt_a49"><span class="u-signIn-txt_span50">签到</span></a>
<div class="e-hover-target left">
    <div class="e-hover-arrow left u-signIn-txt_div51"></div>
    <div class="e-hover-arrow-border left u-signIn-txt_div52"></div>
    <div class="e-hover-content"><div class="u-signIn-txt_div53" title=""><div class="f-dn u-signIn-txt_div54" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span55">慕课君邀请你一起签到</span></div><div class=" u-signIn-txt_div56" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span57">累计签到<em></em>天</span></div><div class="f-dn u-signIn-txt_div58" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span59">坚持因为不止是对知识的渴望，还为了那个努力的自己。</span></div><div class=" u-signIn-txt_div60" title=""><span class="u-signIn-txt_span61">爱学出勤奋，勤奋出天才。<br><p class="f-fr">——郭沫若</p><p></p></span></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>

</div><div id="g-body"><div class="g-doc">
<b class="b-30"></b>
<div class="m-usersetting f-cb f-bg">
<div class="main" id="gx-inner-box">
<div><div class="settingNav j-nav">
<a class="f-fc3 f-f0 selected" href="/user/setting/personInfoEdit.htm#/setting">资料设置</a>
<a class="f-fc3 f-f0" href="/user/setting/accountSetting.htm#/actSetting">帐号设置</a>
<a class="f-fc3 f-f0" href="/user/setting/accountSetting.htm#/mailSetting">邮件设置</a>
</div>
<div class="u-gx-ttop f-cb">
<div class="f-fl f-f0 f-fc9 tipinfo">绝不会以任何形式向第三方透漏你的身份信息</div>
</div>
<div class="" id="personal-info-settings"><div class="personal-info-setting-wrapper">
    <div class="personal-info-setting-head-wrapper">
    <!--inlcude-->
        <div class="input-row-wrapper">
            <div class="input-row-left personal-info-setting-head-profile-image-label-wrapper">

            </div>
            <div class="input-row-right adjust-upward">

        </a>
</div>
                
<!--Regular if3-->
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="input-row-wrapper">
            <div class="input-row-left align-middle">
                <label class="required-input">昵称</label>

    <!--Regular if8-->

            </div>
        </div>
        <!--Regular if10-->
        <div class="input-row-wrapper">
            <div class="input-row-left">
                <label class="required-input">常用邮箱</label>
            </div>
            <div class="input-row-right adjust-upward-5">
                <!--inlcude-->
                    <div class="email-verify-wrapper">
    <div class="email-verify-edit-wrapper">
        <!--Regular if11-->
        <div class="email-verify-email">
            <span></span>
            <span class="marginlr10px f-fc9">未验证</span>
            <span class="marginlr10px">
            <a class="f-fcgreen" href="javascript:;">修改邮箱</a></span>
        </div>
        
    </div>
    <div class="f-fc9 paddingtb10px">用于接收课程通知与电子证书。</div>
    <!--Regular if12-->
    <div class="email-verify-notification">
        <div class="email-verify-notification-icon">
        </div>
        <div class="email-verify-notification-text">
            <div class="email-verify-notification-text-title">
                <span>验证邮件已发送到您填写的邮箱，请查收并验证。</span>
                <span><a class="green-btn" href="/member/thirdMailLogin.htm?email=" target="$$blank">立刻登录邮箱验证</a></span>
            </div>
            <div class="f-fc9">
                <div class="paddingtb2px">如已验证，请刷新页面；</div>
                <div class="paddingtb2px">如果没有收到验证邮件，① 确认邮箱填写正确；② 确认该邮箱已激活；③ 检查垃圾箱；</div>
                <div class="paddingtb2px">如邮件中链接失效，请点击 <a href="javascript:;" class="f-fcgreen">再次发送验证邮件</a></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
</div>
                
<!--Regular if13-->
            </div>
        </div>
         <!--Regular if14-->

        <!--Regular if39--><!--Regular if40-->

                <div class="input-row-left">

                <div class="input-row-right">
                    <div class="width-430px">
                        <!--inlcude-->
                            <div class="ux-radio2-group radio-group-label">
    <!--inlcude-->
        <!--Regular list-->
        <label class="ux-radio" title="博士">
            <div class="radio_box">
                <i class="ux-icon ux-icon-radio"></i>
            </div>
            <!--Regular if43-->
                博士
            
        </label>
        
        <label class="ux-radio" title="研究生">
            <div class="radio_box">
                <i class="ux-icon ux-icon-radio"></i>
            </div>
            <!--Regular if44-->
                研究生
            
        </label>

            <!--Regular if45-->
                本科
            
        </label>
        
        <label class="ux-radio" title="专科">
            <div class="radio_box">
                <i class="ux-icon ux-icon-radio"></i>
            </div>
            <!--Regular if46-->
                专科
            
        </label>
        
    
<!--Regular if47-->
</div>
                            <div class="ux-radio2-group radio-group-label">
    <!--inlcude-->
        <!--Regular list-->
        <label class="ux-radio" title="高中">
            <div class="radio_box">
                <i class="ux-icon ux-icon-radio"></i>
            </div>
            <!--Regular if48-->
                高中
            
        </label>

            <!--Regular if49-->

            <!--Regular if51-->
                其他
            
        </label>
        
    
<!--Regular if52-->
</div>
                        
<!--Regular if53-->
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        
        <!--Regular if54-->
        <div class="input-row-wrapper">
            <div class="input-row-left">
                <label class="">个人简介</label>
            </div>
            <div class="input-row-right">
                <!--Regular if55-->
                <div>
                    <label class="ux-textarea2 ">
    <!--inlcude-->
        <textarea class="ux-textarea ux-textarea_normal ux-textarea_base ux-textarea_" placeholder=""></textarea>
            <!--Regular if56-->
    
<!--Regular if57-->
</label>
                </div>
                    <!--Regular if58-->
                    <div class="f-fc9">
                        还可输入80字。
                    </div>
                    
                
            </div>
        </div>
    
</div>
    <div class="personal-info-setting-save-btn-wrapper">
        <button class="green-btn">保存</button>
    </div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="g-wrap m-foot f-pr" id="j-footer">
<div class="g-flow f-cb">
<div class="f1 f-fl">
<div class="logo"></div>
<p class="f-fc14 f-fc9">由高教社联手网易推出，让每一个有提升愿望的用户能够学到中国知名高校的课程，并获得认证。</p>
